attachments.title: Generationals - Black Lemon by Polyvinyl Records
attachments.text:
From Generationals' upcoming album, Alix, out 9/16. Pre-order the album on 180-gram "cloud colored" LP (limited to 500), CD, cassette, or digital here - <http://polyvinylrecords.com/alix>

Produced by Richard Swift.

Pre-order the album on iTunes - <http://smarturl.it/alix|smarturl.it/alix>

Follow Generationals:
<http://generationals.com>
<http://facebook.com/generationals>
<http://twitter.com/generationals>
<http://instagram.com/generationals>
Soundcloud - @generationals

text: Caribou released a new track too! <https://soundcloud.com/caribouband/our-love>

attachments.title: Our Love by Caribou.
attachments.text:
The title track from my forthcoming album 'Our Love'.

As of tomorrow, Aug 19th, this song comes free with a digital  Pre-order of the new album via ITunes: <http://smarturl.it/ourlove_itunes|smarturl.it/ourlove_itunes>

The track will also be available as a lossless file from the specialized digital stores.

Physical album pre-order: <http://smarturl.it/sfybp1|smarturl.it/sfybp1>

The album 'Our Love' will be released on City Slang Oct 4th in Germany and Oct 6th in the UK/EU and on Merge Oct 7th in Canada and the United States.

Photograph by Jason Evans.
attachments.fallback: SoundCloud Audio: Link: Our Love by Caribou.
